sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
    .awards(:class="[mode ? mode : '']" :id="[mode ? mode : '']")
        .wrapper
            award-card(:class="[mode ? mode : '']")
            h3.awards__title
                slot(name="title") Top Recorders 2019
            p.awards__subtitle
                slot(name="subtitle") Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Maecenas eget purus augue. Vivamus nec neque efficitur, commodo purus id, aliquam nunc.
            .awards__list
                nomination-card(v-for="(index, item) in 5" :key="index" :class="[mode ? mode : '']" data-aos="fade-up")
</template>

<script>
    import AwardCard from '../includes/smallBlocks/awardCard.vue';
    import NominationCard from '../includes/card/nominationCard.vue';

    import AOS from 'aos';
    import '@/helpers/sass/aos.scss';

    export default {
        name: 'Award',
        data: function(){
            return {}
        },
        components: {
            'award-card': AwardCard,
            'nomination-card': NominationCard,
        },
        props: {
            mode: {
                type: String
            }
        },
        created(){
            // this.$nextTick(function() {
            //     AOS.init({
            //         once: true,
            //         disabled: 'mobile',
            //         duration: 800,
            //         offset: 0
            //     });
            // });
        },
        mounted(){
            // AOS.init({
            //     once: true,
            //     disabled: 'mobile'
            // });
            this.$nextTick(() => {
				AOS.init({
					once: true,
					disabled: 'mobile',
					duration: 1000
				});
            })
        }
    }
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
    

    .awards {
        padding: 0 0 123px 0;

        &__title {
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Bold';
            font-size: 36px;
            line-height: 56px;
            text-align: center;
            color: #FF8284;
            margin-bottom: 13px;
            text-align: center;
        }

        &__subtitle {
            font-family: 'Roboto-Regular';
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: 300;
            font-size: 15px;
            line-height: 25px;
            text-align: center;
            color: #37393E;
            opacity: 0.7;
            margin: 0 auto 51px auto;
            text-align: center;
            max-width: 549px;
        }

        &__list {
            display: grid;
            grid-column-gap: 23px;
            grid-row-gap: 23px;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, auto);
        }

        &.application {
            padding-bottom: 95px;

            .awards {
                padding-bottom: 109px;
            }

            .awards__title {
                color: #357FDB;
            }
        }
    }

    @media(max-width: 960px) {
        .awards {
            padding-bottom: 100px;

            &__list {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(2, auto);
            }
        }
    }

    @media(max-width: 640px) {
        .awards {
            padding-bottom: 39px;

            &__title {
                font-size: 32px;
                line-height: 56px;
                text-align: center;
                margin-bottom: 5px;
            }

            &__subtitle {
                max-width: 344px;
                margin-right: auto;
                margin-left: auto;
                margin-bottom: 32px;
            }

            &__list {
                grid-template-columns: auto;
                grid-row-gap: 20px;
            }

            &.application {
                padding-bottom: 46px;
            }
        }
    }
</style>
